message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $13,500.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I really like the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $13,500 is already a very competitive price for this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,200?
